#summary Listing some of the features of the system

= User Experience =

  * Simple straighforward layout
  * using mostly short texts that are hyperlinks instead of icons  
  * focuses on content (cat show photos)
  * first photos provided instantly on front page  
  * easy to switch between English and Finnish and everything changes when switching
  * some user-configurable features and a simple page to do the configuration
  * Facebook share on photos
  * photo browsing logic: thumbnails - big photo         

= What's included =

  * instant find as you type based on real time partial string matching
  * a detailed search engine with feature-rich syntax for advanced users
  * a simple news system with RSS feed to announce site changes    

= What's excluded =

  * forums, user comments, ratings (this is not a community portal but some of these features might be added later)
